safetyTips: We wear masks and gloves at all times and change gloves between drops. Whilst also washing our hands and sanitising as regularly as possible. We are made up of people from 2 houses and we try as much as possible not to come in to contact with each other but if we do we always maintain a 2-metre distance. We drop the wine on the doorstep ring the bell and walk 2 metres back to wait for someone to open the door and collect the wine.
name: Peckham Cellars
description: We are a local wine bar turned delivery service. We offer free delivery to local postcodes. The minimum order for home delivery is three bottles but you can Click & Collect any size order, Tuesday-Saturday 11 am - 3 pm. Cutoff is 3pm for same-day delivery. We do all local deliveries ourselves in our little van - Vanny DeVino.
